openproject.config.addNewConnection=Add new connection openproject.config.cancel=Cancel openproject.config.clientId=Client ID openproject.config.clientIdDescription.first=Go to OpenProject Administration > Wiki connection. openproject.config.clientIdDescription.second=Start the setup & copy the OpenProject OAuth Client ID. Paste it below. openproject.config.clientSecret=Client Secret openproject.config.clientSecretDescription=In OpenProject Administration > Wiki connection, copy the OpenProject OAuth Client Secret. Paste it below. openproject.config.connectionName=Connection Name openproject.config.connectionNameDescription=Set an easily recognizable name for the OpenProject instance you're connecting to. openproject.config.connectionsDescription=Defines access to OpenProject instances and associates a Connection Name to each. The Connection Name can then be used in various Open Project Components whenever an OpenProject instance is required, such as in a parameter for the OpenProject Macro. openproject.config.connectionsTitle=OpenProject Instance Connections openproject.config.create=Create openproject.config.create.created=Connection {0} has been created! openproject.config.create.errorOccured=An error occurred while creating the connection! openproject.config.createNewConnection=Create new connection openproject.config.delete=Delete openproject.config.delete.deleted=Connection has been deleted! openproject.config.delete.errorOccured=An error occurred while deleting the connection! openproject.config.delete.info=Delete connection openproject.config.deleteConnection=Delete connection openproject.config.deleteConnectionDescription.first=You will delete connection {0} openproject.config.deleteConnectionDescription.second=Are you sure you want to proceed? openproject.config.editConnection=Edit connection openproject.config.fillInAllFields=Please fill in all fields! openproject.config.noRights=No Rights openproject.config.serverURL=Server URL openproject.config.serverURLDescription=Copy the link from your browserâ€™s adress bar when you are in your OpenProject instance. Paste it below. openproject.config.serverUrl=Server URL openproject.config.update=Update openproject.config.update=Update openproject.config.update.notUpdated=Connection {0} was not updated! openproject.config.update.updated=Connection {0} has been updated! openproject.livedatalabels.actions = Actions openproject.livedatalabels.clientId=Client ID openproject.livedatalabels.clientSecret=Client Secret openproject.livedatalabels.connectionName=Connection name openproject.livedatalabels.serverURL=Server URL
